articles.content: The state also reported that 7,369 new individuals had been given the molecular coronavirus test, bringing the total of individuals tested to 790,223. The total number of molecular tests that have be… [+4238 chars]

articles.author: By Rachel Monahan
articles.title: As Cases Rise in Multnomah County, Officials Offer an Explanation: Clusters in Families - Willamette Week
